content.answer: To initiate a return, please submit a request for a Return Authorization (RA) through your YFW account. Alternatively, you can contact our [Customer Care](https://www.google.com) team to assist you with the return process. YFW adheres to a strict no\-paper policy, so as to reduce waste. This is why shipments do not include a return slip inside the box.
content.name: How do I return or exchange an item?
content.question: How do I return or exchange an item?
